title: Font used in "Efdemin — Chicago Remixes (2)"
content:
Hi everyone,

Can anybody help me to find this font ?  
It's used in the "Efdemin — Chicago Remixes (2)" EP on Dial Records. Artwork by ITF Grafikdesign

Merci in advance !

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829171106im_/http:/typophile.com/files/385282_273275809381201_203988920_n_4465.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [385282\_273275809381201\_203988920\_n.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829171106/http:/typophile.com/files/385282_273275809381201_203988920_n.jpg) | 16.41 KB |
author: Alphonse

comments.content:
Can't find a match, this /M is throwing me out... The more I look at it the more I think /M (2 N?) is custom and may be /G (from /O) too... May be directly asking ITF Grafikdesign would worth a shot (and if they answer, drop the answer here).  
Some alternatives for the time being: [Sofia](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829171106/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mostardesign/sofia-pro), [Planeta](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829171106/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/gestalten/planeta_ot), [Brown](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829171106/http:/lineto.com/The%20Fonts/Font%20Categories/Text%20Fonts/Brown), [Neuzeit Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829171106/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/neuzeit+grotesk)
